summary: Role-based UI update: move the "Register New School" navigation item from the Marketing Dashboard to the Admin Dashboard, and restrict Marketing users to view-only access for school details (remove Register and Edit actions).
architectural_notes: Enforce role-based access in UI: Admin can register schools; Marketing is view-only (no register/edit actions).

existing_features.title: Move the “Register School” navigation entry from the Marketing UI to the Admin UI so that Admin users see a “Register School” item in the top navigation (header) next to the existing Admin items, and Marketing users no longer see any “Register School” navigation entry.

Update routing so the school registration page is accessible from an Admin route (e.g., under /admin/...) and is not accessible to Marketing users. If a Marketing user attempts to access the old Marketing registration route directly, redirect them to the Marketing dashboard (or an authorized page).
Restrict Marketing to view-only access on the School Details page by removing the Edit action for Marketing users and ensuring the form fields remain read-only for them.

new_feature_requests.summary: Move "Register New School" option from Marketing Dashboard to Admin Dashboard navigation (next to existing nav items)
Restrict Marketing role to view-only for school details by removing Register and Edit options from Marketing UI
Enforce backend authorization so Marketing users cannot create new schools or update school details via API calls, even if they attempt to bypass the UI; Admin users must retain these capabilities.

projectName: Move “Register School” to Admin navigation and make Marketing view-only for schools
